mapper.sql: ID, NAME, PID, IMG_PATH, AUTOHOME_URL, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, SCOPE_ID, MADE_ID, YEAR, LEVEL
attr.ID as attrId, attr.NAME as attrName, attr.VAL, attr.CAR_TYPE_ID, attr.PARENT_ORDER_INDEX, attr.CHILD_ORDER_INDEX
mapper.select:
SELECT info.ID, info.NAME, info.PID, info.IMG_PATH, info.AUTOHOME_URL, info.CREATE_TIME, info.UPDATE_TIME, info.SCOPE_ID, info.MADE_ID, info.YEAR, info.LEVEL,
FROM t_autohome_car_info info LEFT JOIN t_autohome_car_attr attr ON SUBSTRING(info.ID,3) = attr.CAR_TYPE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND attr.CHILD_ORDER_INDEX is NOT NULL AND info.ID= #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select tx.ID, tx.NAME, tx.PID, tx.IMG_PATH, tx.AUTOHOME_URL, tx.CREATE_TIME, tx.UPDATE_TIME, tx.SCOPE_ID, tx.MADE_ID, tx.YEAR, tx.LEVEL,ta.brand_id as relation_id,ta.autohome_id, 'CB' as data_type from t_autohome_car_info tx LEFT JOIN t_brand_autohome ta on ta.autohome_id = tx.id where tx.ID like 'CB%' UNION ALL select tx.ID, tx.NAME, tx.PID, tx.IMG_PATH, tx.AUTOHOME_URL, tx.CREATE_TIME, tx.UPDATE_TIME, tx.SCOPE_ID, tx.MADE_ID, tx.YEAR, tx.LEVEL,ta.factory_id as relation_id,ta.autohome_id, 'CF' as data_type from t_autohome_car_info tx LEFT JOIN t_car_factory_autohome ta on ta.autohome_id = tx.id where tx.ID like 'CF%' UNION ALL select tx.ID, tx.NAME, tx.PID, tx.IMG_PATH, tx.AUTOHOME_URL, tx.CREATE_TIME, tx.UPDATE_TIME, tx.SCOPE_ID, tx.MADE_ID, tx.YEAR, tx.LEVEL,ta.car_dept_id as relation_id,ta.autohome_id, 'CS' as data_type from t_autohome_car_info tx LEFT JOIN t_car_dept_autohome ta on ta.autohome_id = tx.id where tx.ID like 'CS%' UNION ALL select tx.ID, tx.NAME, tx.PID, tx.IMG_PATH, tx.AUTOHOME_URL, tx.CREATE_TIME, tx.UPDATE_TIME, tx.SCOPE_ID, tx.MADE_ID, tx.YEAR, tx.LEVEL,ta.car_id as relation_id,ta.autohome_id, 'CT' as data_type from t_autohome_car_info tx LEFT JOIN t_car_autohome ta on ta.autohome_id = tx.id where tx.ID like 'CT%'
mapper.insert: insert into t_autohome_car_info (ID, NAME, PID, IMG_PATH, AUTOHOME_URL, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, SCOPE_ID, MADE_ID, YEAR, LEVEL) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{autohomeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{scopeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{madeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_autohome_car_info
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PID = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMG_PATH = #{imgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTOHOME_URL = #{autohomeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SCOPE_ID = #{scopeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MADE_ID = #{madeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_autohome_car_info set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PID = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMG_PATH = #{imgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTOHOME_URL = #{autohomeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SCOPE_ID = #{scopeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MADE_ID = #{madeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
